channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @XavierOnassis1 they're flyover country and they know it. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @XavierOnassis1 they're flyover country and they know it. ;-)

item.description: @w1111e depends where you're coming from. i grew up a few blocks from there. and coming from the north, i'd just go over the throggs neck bridge and you're right there.
item.source:markdown: @w1111e depends where you're coming from. i grew up a few blocks from there. and coming from the north, i'd just go over the throggs neck bridge and you're right there.

item.description: @tanyaweiman @georgehahn @ZabarsIsNY oh man i am so wanting a ny bagel.
item.source:markdown: @tanyaweiman @georgehahn @ZabarsIsNY oh man i am so wanting a ny bagel.

item.description:
@XavierOnassis1 yes i do believe queens has the best bagels. not all hyped up by the manhattan bagels. their bagels are too damn big. a bagel is a modest food, not a flamboyant one.

@XavierOnassis1 Which borough has the best bagels?
item.source:markdown:
@XavierOnassis1 yes i do believe queens has the best bagels. not all hyped up by the manhattan bagels. their bagels are too damn big. a bagel is a modest food, not a flamboyant one.
@XavierOnassis1 Which borough has the best bagels?

item.description: @michaelpinto well thank you michael. what a nice thought. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @michaelpinto well thank you michael. what a nice thought. ;-)

item.description:
I might take a drive down to NYC this week to buy some bagels in Queens.

My favorite bagels place, opened way after I left -- but what they have is the basic Queens bagel.

https://t.co/PobPFuUqXE
item.source:markdown:
I might take a drive down to NYC this week to buy some bagels in Queens.
My favorite bagels place, opened way after I left -- but what they have is the basic Queens bagel.
https://t.co/PobPFuUqXE

item.description:
I'm rewatching Game of Thrones, and I have to say it's a shitty show. Seemed much more grandiose even masterful one episode every week.

Like The Sopranos there is one scene that I think is the biggest moment of the whole series. It's the very last scene in the Battle of the Bastards. I won't spoil it by saying what happens, just that the subtle smile on Sansa's face in the last shot is the clue.
item.source:markdown:
I'm rewatching Game of Thrones, and I have to say it's a shitty show. Seemed much more grandiose even masterful one episode every week.
Like The Sopranos there is one scene that I think is the biggest moment of the whole series. It's the very last scene in the Battle of the Bastards. I won't spoil it by saying what happens, just that the subtle smile on Sansa's face in the last shot is the clue.

item.description: As a Mets fan I don't hate the Yankees because they're our rivals. I hate them because they're the Yankees.

item.description:
I was never that into Van Morrison, but his music fits perfectly with the Echo Studio speaker. I just say Alexa play Van Morrison and get to writing.

https://t.co/pmcAeRdVzj
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
I hate Hawley but he's onto something.

The Dems probably unintentionally do things to push male voters away. He, and the Repubs are milking that for all it's worth.

You can argue the righteousness of it, but it's bad politics, bad for winning elections.

BTW by making him famous helping him, even if you say nasty shit about him.

Ask @GeorgeLakoff. People don't care whether you like him or not, but when you push him, you're creating a bigger space in their minds labeled X where X is the name of the asshole you're writing about.
item.source:markdown:
I hate Hawley but he's onto something.
The Dems probably unintentionally do things to push male voters away. He, and the Repubs are milking that for all it's worth.
You can argue the righteousness of it, but it's bad politics, bad for winning elections.
BTW by making him famous helping him, even if you say nasty shit about him.
Ask @GeorgeLakoff. People don't care whether you like him or not, but when you push him, you're creating a bigger space in their minds labeled X where X is the name of the asshole you're writing about.
